thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Monolithic Power Systems Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.27

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Monolithic Power Systems Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.27
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Monolithic Power Systems Inc:
* MONOLITHIC POWER SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017, AND AN INCREASE IN QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 * Q4 REVENUE $129.4 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.82 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES Q1 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $122 MILLION TO $128 MILLION * SEES Q1 GAAP GROSS MARGIN BETWEEN 54.8% AND 55.8%; SEES Q1 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN BETWEEN 55.3% AND 56.3%
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $122.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
